description: This is a fantasy update featuring Cherry Torn and Penny Pax. Cherry is taken to a dark abandoned room blindfolded and restrained. She is unaware of what her captor has planned for her, and all she can think of is escaping. Cherry soon realizes that she is not the only one he has done this to and this harsh realization scares her more now than ever. She and her new found companion are both throat fucked, ass fucked, and brutally tormented for his sadistic pleasure. There is no escaping this place, there will be only pain and suffering, and there is nothing either one of them can do to make it stop.
title: Captive Companions
